alert.note: Alert for Churchill (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 16 at 6:29PM PDT until July 16 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Southwestern Churchill County in west central Nevada... * Until 730 PM PDT. * At 625 PM PDT, thunderstorm outflow winds kicked up blowing dust near and along Highway 50. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Fallon Municipal Airport, Junction U.S 50 And Nv 121 (Dixie Valley Rd), Junction U.S 50 And NV 839, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), Sand Mountain Campground, Junction U.S 95 And NV 120 (Pasture Rd), Frenchman, Sand Mountain and Fallon Station. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
